name: Middleage Mutant Dolphin Lundgren (#seajam #teamseas)
description:
This is a game that was made for the #seajam, that was created by Polymars to get game dev community to participate in #teamseas fundraiser to help clean the oceans.

I already donated to #teamseas here - https://teamseas.org/ and you should too if you are able to.

The Game is about a Middleage Mutant Dolphin Lundgren. 

Plot:
It's 2036, The Corporate Shark has made a deal with filthy humans to use this part of the ocean for regular trash dumps. It's on Dolphin Lundgren to stop him and his mutated trash minions from taking over this part of the ocean. 

Travel 60 seconds to meet and destroy the shark!

Controls (controller support tested only on PS5 controller):

  • WASD / ARROWS / ANALOG - MOVE
  • HoLD CRTL / LMB / SQUARE - SHOOT
  • ALT / RMB / X - Special attack ( 50% mana cost )
  • SPACE / Triangle - Jump over trash, bullets and aviod contact with the enemies
